headline.main: K. OF C. PARADE ON OCT. 12; 3,000 Will March to Columbus Circle Next Sunday

lead_paragraph: Five thousand members of the New York Chapter, Knights of Columbus, and its women auxiliaries will parade from chapter headquarters, Eighth Avenue and Fifty-first Street, to Columbus Circle next Sunday, Columbus Day. The procession will start at 11:30 A.M. Patriotic and religious exercises will be held at the circle at the end of the parade.
abstract: Members to get Brit-Amer Ambulance Corps awards for aiding corps fund drive
